sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-row class="mb-4">
      <b-col v-for="(type, index) in widTypeRamification" md="6" xl="3" :key="type">
          <Select2  :placeholder="type.type"  v-model="widTypeRamification[index].value" required :options="listRamifications.filter(item => item.type.id === widTypeRamification[index].id).map(ram => ({id: ram.id, text: ram.nom}))"    />


      </b-col>
  </b-row>

</template>
<script>
import Select2 from 'vue3-select2-component';
import UserMixins from "@/mixins/userMixins"


export default {
    mixins:[UserMixins],

    components:{
        Select2
    },
    data(){
      return{

      }
    },

    created() {
        this.user = this.$store.state.currentUser;
        let userEntite = [];
        let userRamification = [];
        //userRamification = this.user.affectations.filter(item => item.ramification != null && item.enabled === true);

        if (this.user.type.nom !== 'Super Admin'){
           if (this.user.affectations.length > 0){
              this.user.affectations.forEach(item => {
                  if(item.enabled === true){
                      if (item.entite !== null){
                          userEntite = this.user.affectations.filter(item => item.entite != null && item.enabled === true);
                          this.fields.push({colonne: 'ent.id', operator: 'in', value: userEntite.map(item=> item.id), connector: "and"})
                      }
                      if (item.ramification !== null){
                          userRamification = this.user.affectations.filter(item => item.ramification != null && item.enabled === true);
                          this.fields.push({colonne: 'ent.id', operator: 'in', value: userRamification.map(item=> item.entite.id), connector: "and"})

                      }
                  }
              })
           }
        }

      


    }

}
</script>
